title: Help ID this font
content:
This font is close to copperplate but it is not copperplate. The W is different. I recognize it but I can't remember the name. Please help.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WineClassicLogo2012-BW_5222.jpg)
author: Barbmg

comments.content:
[ITC Serif Gothic Extrabold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131544/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/serif-gothic/) designed by : Herb Lubalin & Antonio DiSpigna

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ITCSerifGothicExtraBold_6111.jpg)
  
Don

Thank you so much Don! I love this forum. I'm really good at font ID but when I get stumped this is the only solution.

Best,  
Barb

You're welcome. I value the forum for the same reason you do. When I draw a blank its great to have access to the variety of expertise shown by our colleagues.  
Don
